name: Kenny Everett Sardines
description:
WARNING!!! THIS IS INCOMPLETE AND BUGGY 

I could have sworn, back in the day, that there was a Kenny Everett video game -- to the point where I can visualise the cassette box on a shelf in WH Smiths but alas no such game exists. 

I am posting this as it has come up in a recent conversation about a project a friend is doing  and I wanted to share it. 

To stress !! this is buggy !! 

One of the first bugs is in the Bee Gee opening. For it to work, after selecting your three bee gees you need to let the notes play out. You will hear a klaxon if the notes are in the wrong order.

To progress from the breakout stage, just let the beer can fall into the abys. 

There is nothing past the giant Sarah Brightman Robot taking off 

I
